headline: Verizon CEO Dan Schulman: ‘We’ll Hit AGI in the Next 2–4 Years’
summary: Calling the moment “unprecedented,” Schulman says AI models are improving every two months and predicts human-level intelligence will emerge sooner than most expect.

raw.headline: Verizon CEO Dan Schulman: ‘We’ll Hit AGI in the Next 2–4 Years’
raw.summary: Calling the moment “unprecedented,” Schulman says AI models are improving every two months and predicts human-level intelligence will emerge sooner than most expect.

headline: Status Solutions Network Welcomes Verizon Business as National Sponsor to Advance Safe Schools and Connected Communities Nationwide
summary: Status Solutions Network (SSN) today announced that Verizon Business will join as a new National Sponsor, marking a major milestone in SSN's mission to connect, engage, and protect local communities across the United States.

raw.headline: Status Solutions Network Welcomes Verizon Business as National Sponsor to Advance Safe Schools and Connected Communities Nationwide

headline: Is Verizon’s New AWS Partnership and Multi-Billion Debt Issuance Shifting the Outlook for VZ?
summary: On November 10, 2025, Verizon Communications completed the sale of €2.25 billion and £1 billion in junior subordinated notes due 2056, shortly after announcing new enterprise deals including the launch of a dedicated Verizon 5G-powered network at KPMG’s new U.S. headquarters and a fiber network partnership with Amazon Web Services. These actions highlight Verizon’s dual focus on strengthening its funding flexibility for long-term investments and deepening engagement with major enterprise...

headline: AST SpaceMobile Inc (ASTS) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Commercial Traction and ...
